thread.title: You will be able to stream Star Wars: The Force Awakens on Netflix - if you live in Canada - Movies
thread.title_full: You will be able to stream Star Wars: The Force Awakens on Netflix - if you live in Canada - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: You will be able to stream Star Wars: The Force Awakens on Netflix - if you live in Canada - Movies
text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens is coming exclusively to Netflix in 2016… if you live in Canada, that is.JJ Abrams's highly-anticipated franchise revival will be available to stream on Netflix Canada approximately eight months after it leaves cinemas, reports Variety. © Lucasfilm / IMAX While Netflix US recently signed an exclusive deal for Disney's output beginning in 2016, The Force Awakens's December release means it misses that window by a few short weeks.Thus, The Force Awakens falls under Disney's current deal with US premium channel Starz for its content through the end of this year.Meanwhile, it was recently confirmed that The Force Awakens will not be included in Disney's forthcoming streaming service in the UK either. © Lucasfilm While The Force Awakens has been ruled out for Netflix in most territories, the streaming giant continues to negotiate with Disney for the rights to past movies in the series.Netflix previously partnered with Disney-owned Lucasfilm to revive the beloved animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars for 13 episodes last year.Star Wars: The Force Awakens hits UK cinemas on December 17, before reaching the US one day later.Watch the new Star Wars: The Force Awakens trailer below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart);
